sen.j: 諸陵寮(しょりょうりょう)は律令制において治部省に属する機関。
sen.e: Shoryoryo was an organization which belonged to Jibu-sho Ministry (the Ministry of Civil Administration) under the Ritsuryo system (a system of centralized government based on the ritsuryo code).

sen.j: 諸陵寮・諸陵司の職掌は陵墓の管理・喪葬・皇族葬儀の儀礼などである。
sen.e: Official duties of Shoryoryo/Shoryo-shi included management of imperial mausoleum, mourning and funeral rites for the imperial family.

sen.j: 特に陵墓管理については陵戸の名簿を管理してその守衛にあたらせた。
sen.e: For the management of imperial mausoleums in particular, the bureau kept the name list of Ryoko (imperial tomb guard) and made them guard the mausoleums.

sen.j: 凶事が起こった際には死者のたたりと考えて寮の役人を不遇であった皇族の陵墓に送ってこれを慰めた。
sen.e: When misfortunes took place, they were regarded as curse of the dead, officers of Ryo were sent to the mausoleum of an unfortunate imperial family and consoled the spirit.
